titleStmt.title: Great news from the Duke of Schomberge's army giving an impartial account of the late bloody fight and engagement between the Irish papists and our English forces : with an account of men kill'd and wounded, together with a journal of the whole siege of Carrickfergus ... / written in a letter from Chester, directed to Mr. John Blackhall from on board the Mary galley at High-lake, August 31, 1689.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
